1: 1 7-45 - a quarter to eight или seven forty-five a. m.
2 8-32 - twenty-eight minutes to nine или eight thirty-two a. m.
3 20-36 - twenty-four minutes to nine или eight thirty-six p. m.
4 13-50 - ten minutes to two или one fifty p. m.
5 18-52 - eight minutes to seven или six fifty-two p. m.
6 19-11 - eleven minutes past seven или seven eleven p. m.
7 16-30 - half past four или four thirty p. m.
8 17-45 - a quarter to six или five forty-five p. m.
9 13-15 - a quarter past one или one fifteen p. m.
